H0.text: What is the capital and largest city of the Islamic Republic of Mauritania. Dakar

H1.text: What is the capital and largest city of the Islamic Republic of Mauritania. Timbuktu

H2.text: What is the capital and largest city of the Islamic Republic of Mauritania. Agadir

H3.text: What is the capital and largest city of the Islamic Republic of Mauritania. Noukchott

A4.text: the capital and largest city, Nouakchott, on the Atlantic coast

A5.text: France chose Nouakchott as the site of the new capital of Mauritania

A7.text: the area of present-day Nouakchott was chosen by Moktar Ould Daddah, the first President of Mauritania, and his advisors
